title: Things JSON Library
description: The common definitions from the Things domain that can be reused in Things standard schemas

Identifier.title: Identifier
Identifier.description: An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.

Instruction.title: Instruction
Instruction.description: A communication conveyed to or left for a recipient who cannot be contacted directly, that directs the recipient to perform specific activities.

ThingInstruction.title: Thing-Instruction
ThingInstruction.description: Thing is be handled per instruction

instruction.title: Each Thing-Instruction may be handled per one and only one Instruction
